t_minus_3: Your period may start in 3 days
t_minus_3_detail: Based on your cycle, expect your period around {{date}}
period_started_detail: Be gentle with yourself. Remember to stay hydrated and rest when needed.
period_mid_detail: You're doing great! Don't forget to rest and take care of yourself.
period_ended_detail: Ready for new energy! Great time to start new activities.
phase_follicular_detail: Energy is rising. Perfect time for new beginnings and challenges.
phase_ovulation_detail: Peak energy and fertility window. You might feel extra confident!
phase_luteal_detail: Energy stabilizing. Focus on self-care and gentle activities.
phase_pms_detail: Be extra kind to yourself. Rest, eat well, and ask for support if needed.
partner_period_incoming: {{partner}} may start their period in 3 days
partner_period_started_detail: Be supportive and understanding. Offer help with daily tasks.
partner_critical_window_detail: Extra support appreciated. Consider being more patient and caring.
logging_reminder: Don't forget to log your day
irregularity_detail: Your cycle is {{days}} days different from average. Consider consulting a healthcare provider if concerned.
link_revoked: Partner link with {{partner}} has been revoked
communication_tip_menstrual: During the menstrual phase, offer practical support like helping with chores or bringing comfort items.
communication_tip_pms: During PMS, practice patience and avoid unnecessary conflicts. Small gestures of kindness go a long way.
communication_tip_ovulation: This is often a time of high energy and confidence. Great for planning fun activities together.
communication_tip_luteal: Energy levels may vary. Be understanding and flexible with plans.
